```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(gapminder)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
head(gapminder)
```

```{r}
ggplot(gapminder, aes(x = gdpPercap,
                      y = lifeExp,
                      color = continent,
                      size = pop)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  facet_wrap(year ~ .)
```

```{r}
library(datasets)
head(airquality)
```
```{r}
airquality %>%  tidyr::gather("Measure", "Value", 1:4) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Day,
             y = Value,
             color = Measure)) + 
  geom_point(na.rm = TRUE) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_grid(Measure ~ Month, scales = "free_y")
```
